name: SinSeed
description:
SinSeed is a battle royale game with no time limits.

An island awaits you that you will fight endlessly.

A never-ending battle royale game, you are the only one to rule this world!
Think of a battle royale game, when you face off against thousands of online players and rule the kingdom, you are now their worst enemy.

Start with the character class that's right for you.

Defeat enemies and survive on SinSeed island!

Upgrade your items, be the King, rule the island.
